labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 21425, Version Hash: df47d2bb54e0b94e583d8de5d76ed5b7bb63d267
data.actual_result: KSP crashes with an access violation (0xc0000005) in , trying to read from location 00000000.
data.short_description: Starting KSP 64 bit with OpenGL while desktop Discord is open causes KSP to crash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure the overlay is enabled - KSP does not actually need to have the overlay enabled for it; it'll try to add it anyways - Run  -force-opengl
